title: Dressed Up: A Bound & Gagged Short Story
description: Never judge a book by its cover.Aurora prefers to read her romance novels, long for her crush from afar and avoid disclosing her profession of making custom erotic apparel and furniture. When her coveted crush, Nia, asks to use her kinky knowledge as part of an innocent research project, Aurora wonders if it’s worth risking their friendship. What would Nia think when she sees the dominant side of her usually quiet friend?Dressed Up is the first thrilling and sexy story of Bound & Gagged about the ties that bind us – and the ties that bind us. In this erotic fantasy, the only way to heaven is through our most primal urges.
author: Faye  Black
